description: Loft To Let:  Holtz and Kirk Mannheim are looking at a loft that is for rent.  Kirk seizes the opportunity of the slow freight elevator to suck Holtz's cock and ass on the way up.  Jack Egan is showing the loft and comes on to Kirk.  Now it's Kirk's turn to get his dick sucked.  Holtz catches up with the other two to make it a threesome.
title: Badlands, Scene #02
